_comment: Maps eval scenarios to R2 image URLs and expected score ranges. Images are too large for git; they are stored in R2 and cached locally on first test run.

living_room_mcm.description: Mid-century modern living room with warm woods and earthy tones

bedroom_minimal.description: Minimalist bedroom with neutral palette and clean lines

kitchen_modern.description: Modern kitchen with white cabinetry and marble counters
